PersonalStatement.text: Joshua Johnson, born on 1986-11-26, is a Female based in Lake Cheryl, Zimbabwe. She is Single and holds Singaporean nationality. Currently working at Patton LLC.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Peters, Carter and Ellis from 2006 to 2016.
Senior HR Manager at Patton LLC, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from Universiti Brunei Darussalam (UBD)

PersonalSkills.text: Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys reading.
